name: Game Maker Backup File
summary: Learn about .GB2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can open a GB2 file by using the import function in GameMaker: Studio. First, select File â†’ Import Project... and then, choose your file.

description: Backup file created by GameMaker: Studio, a game development application for Windows; created as a backup of the original project file.
